boardgame.name: InWord
boardgame.description:
InWord is a fast word game where you have to find words that contain a random combination of three letters - in the exact order and without interposing other letters.

InWord is a quick word game for 2 to 6 people. You'll discover how many words there are with letter combinations that at first seem impossible.

How do you play InWord?

Reveal three random cards side by side and think of words in which that combination appears - in exactly that order and without interposing other letters.

If you can't think of a single word, you should pass before anyone else. Now you have to hope that nobody in the round can think of a word. Then you will get 10 points directly on your account.
But if at least one person comes up with a word then you get 10 minus points instead.

If someone gets particularly creative, then you simply vote on whether you accept that word. If more than half of the thumbs point up, the word counts, otherwise it just doesn't. Very simple!

Otherwise, the others take turns to name a word. Whoever can't find a word, is out. The person who is the last to have a word then gets the number of words found up to that point as points.

Then the next round begins with a new combination of letters ...

You can end the game at any time if you feel like it. Whoever has the most points wins, of course.

If you have people with you who think too long or if you just want to increase the speed, you can also set a time limit.

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Blacksmiths of Steinnheimr
boardgame.description:
Blacksmiths of Steinnheimr will transport you to a dwarven kingdom full of adventurers and artisans alike. In Steinnheimr, players find themselves competing amongst each other to meet the demands of the kingdom.

Will you focus on crafting items? Will you instead contribute to the expansion efforts, in an attempt to win the favor of the kingdom? Perhaps you will focus on upgrading your workshop, allowing you to craft higher value items than your competitors. During their turns players will need to find the best path to victory in order to rise above their competition.

Blacksmiths of Steinnheimr is a medium-light worker placement game for 2-4 players that is played in about 45 minutes. Turns move quickly, and the rules are simple to learn, allowing the game to be picked up and played easily.

On each turn, players will place and remove workers from the game board in order to take the various associated actions. Through doing so, they will gather resources, build upgrades, contribute to the kingdom and craft items. The game will end once a number of items have been crafted, varying by player count. The player with the most victory points at the end of the game will be declared the winner.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Tribes of the Wind
Les Tribus du Vent
boardgame.description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, the tribes of the wind are going to rebuild the world on the polluted ruins from the past.

Players will have to plant forests, build new villages and temples, and decontaminate surrounding areas.

They will be able to play cards from their hand. But be carefull! The effect or even the possibility of playing the card may vary depending on...the back of your surrounding opponents'cards.
Players may also send their wind riders to explore the area, plant forests or build villages and temples using all the gathered ressources.

Along the game, you will manage to complete some objectives that will allow you to unlock your guide's special abilities, and to improve your tribes' powers.

When someone builds their 5th village, the game will be about to end. The player with the more points, depending on pollution, villages, temples, layout of their forests and other various objectives, will be the winner!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Cult of Freyja
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mystery cults are secret societies that exist within religious institutions. Like other secret societies, their existence is well known, but their rituals, lore, and objectives are concealed. Only the initiated are allowed access to these secrets.

This file provides an overview of mystery cults and specific details about the Cult of Freyja, one of the most important goddesses in the Amazons vs Valkyries setting.

Features:

Sample cult secrets
The location of Freyja's shrines
Festivals held in Freyja's honor
Paladin's Oath of the Perfect Companion
Paladin's Oath of the Warrior's Resolve
If you're playing an Amazons vs Valkyries campaign, this cult is essential. If you are playing another fantasy campaign with a mighty goddess of Fertility, Prophecy, Magic, and War, you should still check this out!

boardgame.name: Space Jam: A New Legacy - The Game
boardgame.description:
The Tune Squad faces the Goon Squad in a wacky basketball beat-em-up!

Back in December 2020, Xbox called all gamers, Space Jam fans and coding enthusiasts to submit their ideas for the new Space Jam: A New Legacy game available first with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. After reviewing submissions from around the world, Xbox and the Digital Eclipse development team selected the ideas and game concepts from two lucky winners, whose ideas have come to life in one of the looniest arcade style challenges around:

As part of his scheme to become an all-powerful digital force, a rogue artificial intelligence named Al-G Rhythm has trapped basketball champion and global icon LeBron James inside the Warner Bros. server.

While plotting to have his Goon Squad square off against LeBron and the Tune Squad in a high-stakes, high-tech basketball game, Al-G locks himself away in a hidden area of cyberspace.

If LeBron, Bugs Bunny, and Lola Bunny can find all three pieces of the ""Legacy Code,"" they can use it to open up Al-G's secret lair. But standing in their way is the rogue AI's robot

boardgame.name: Unique Locations: Collection 06
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Whether encountered on a quest, or simply found while traveling from here to there, feel free to add these unique locations to your next gaming session. Some are magical, most are mysterious, some are less-than-interesting.

Locations include:

The party has been sent to guard a cell, but it's empty
Two days ride from the nearest town is a sanctuary, with hooded residents
Built within a mountain is a stone fortress. Who built it and why?
Work is being done to rebuild an old castle, but the workers have disappeared

boardgame.name: Rankster
boardgame.description:
Rankster is a radically different co-operative quiz game in which you have to agree how you would rank famous people (and your friends).

Everybody has a turn to be the Judge and the other players have to guess EXACTLY what the Judge chose. If they are right, then everyone — including the Judge — wins a point; if they fail, everyone loses. The goal for the group is to get more right than wrong. It is addictively funny, but very difficult.

How to play:

1) Reveal three character cards.

2) The Judge takes a question card, reads it to themselves, and secretly decides how they want to rank the characters on the basis of the question. They then read the question aloud to the other players.

3) The other players discuss and have to all agree together what they think the Judge has decided. Reveal the answer. If the players are correct, then everyone wins the round; if any answers were wrong, everyone loses.

EXAMPLE:
Q: Who would you choose as the drummer in your rock band?
—Hermione Grainger
—George Washington
—Shrek

Start a new round, reveal three new characters and the next player becomes Judge. Play until all players have been the Judge. You all win if you have succeeded more often than failing. It is not easy!

boardgame.name: UEBS II
Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator 2
Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator II
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still in active development and available to the public for purchase in it's unfinished state, either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).





User Summary

The follow up on Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator - but with 100 times more characters on screen. Play various campaigns in an RTS mode or fight in simulation mode as a soldier on the battlefield.

boardgame.name: Дръж ми шапката
boardgame.description:
Form teams of at least two players. Create a deck of Word cards. Pick a Colour card - it will determine which words you’ll be describing. Each turn a player from each team will try to describe the word so their team members guess the word correctly before the time runs out. At the end of each turn, players draw a Special card. The game lasts 3 rounds:


Round 1 - Players can use as many words as they want without using the word itself.
Round 2 - Players can now use only 1 word for their description.
Round 3 - Players can use only gestures and sounds to describe the Word card.


Each round continues until all Word cards have been played. At the end of the round count the number of correctly guessed words and write down their points. The teams put the Word cards back into the deck, shuffle them, and begin the next round. The team that earns the most points wins the game.

—user summary

Играчите се разделят на отбори. Формира се тесте от карти с думи. Избира се карта с цвят, която определя думите за обяснение по време на цялата игра. На всеки ход един от играчите обяснява думи, които трябва да бъдат познати от неговите съотборници преди изтичане на времето.

Ходът на всеки отбор приключва с изтеглянето на специална карта. Играта продължава в три кръга, като думите се обясняват чрез описание, една дума и мимики. Всеки кръг приключва с познаването на всички думи.

Играта печели отборът с най-много точки от трите кръга.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: We Were Here Forever
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Fourth installment of the We Were Here game series, where you and your partner wakes up in Castle Rock's dungeons. Work together to escape Castle Rock - if it is even possible...

boardgame.name: WARCHESS
boardgame.description:
This wargame was designed by O’Farell & Robinson and printed by Hely’s of Dublin in the 1940s (most likely the early 1940s). It may very well be a prototype. The game was first owned by a Dublin printer in the 1940s and remained within the same family until 2022.

Similar to some other wargames of the era, the objective is to capture the enemy’s GHQ using a variety of combat units while defending your own GHQ. In WARCHESS the units are comprised of infantry, tanks, artillery, forts (which remain stationary once placed), trucks, and trains. The latter two allow you to move eligible units a greater distance. WARCHESS is played on a game board showing a map of Western Europe with square “hexes” created using a vertical and horizontal grid.

Contemporary games to this include Dennis Wheatley’s Invasion (1938) and Campaign by Wills & Hepworth Ltd (1940). Campaign would be the most similar in play, with WARCHESS being more complicated due to the availability of more unit types.

boardgame.name: Tome of Adventure Design Revised
boardgame.description:
From the back cover:

Tome of Adventure Design is a comprehensive, start-to-finish resource for designing fantasy adventures for your favorite tabletop role-playing game. It is system neutral, and can be used with virtually any fantasy game. This book includes random generation tables for almost every step of the design process: locations, villainous plots, designing new monsters, and bizarre environments in strange, unknown planes of existence. Thousands of micro-prompts in the margins add additional brainstorming power to the process, and the book is filled with design advice from award-winning author Matt Finch.

boardgame.name: Thunderstone Quest: Nature's Wrath
boardgame.description:
A new expansion for one of the best Deck Builders, is your party ready for the next quest?

The shaman Kar’nomal has become fed up with the impact of civilization upon the realm of nature. He and his followers seek to control the elemental forces of the world in an effort to let the wilderness in all its forms reclaim the entire world and all life in it. He will seek to strike at the Village, punishing all except those in step with the Elements.

boardgame.name: Thunderstone Quest: Rotten Roots
boardgame.description:
A new Quest for Thunderstone Quest, This Deck Builder, will take your party to an adventure on a new level!

A new guardian, Filleath has always felt he was destined for more, but it seems he’s always lived in the shadow of greater creatures, none greater than Ashbrow, the great tree guardian of the Deepwood. But a new pact with a being from the Abyssal lands will bring an end to all that. Now armed with dark powers, he will spread a blight that puts the entire forest in jeopardy.
